changeSet.sql: UPDATE client_group SET name=CONCAT(name, ' ', id) where id in ( SELECT id FROM client_group cg inner join ( SELECT client_id, lower(name) as name, count(*) as num FROM client_group group by client_id, name having count(*) > 1 ) AS DUP ON cg.client_id = DUP.client_id)
